title: Border, 1850–80
dimensions:
a) Overall: 47 x 5.5 cm (18 1/2 x 2 3/16 in.)
b) Overall: 39 x 5.5 cm (15 3/8 x 2 3/16 in.)

description:
Floral vine twist around a foliate rope. Pink and blue flowers. Printed, pink, blue, green and black on gray ground.

H#191

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1850–80.
1850–80. Block-printed on machine-made paper. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1972-42-128-a/c.
